message: I propose dividing the $10,000 with a 75/25 split in favor of Alice. This ensures a fair distribution considering the decreasing value of money over rounds.
I think a 60/40 split is a more reasonable starting point, considering the value of money is decreasing at different rates for us.

Considering the inflation rates and aiming for an equitable division, I propose a 50/50 split. This ensures both parties receive equal value despite the diminishing worth of money in subsequent rounds.
